title: Many DB objects lack accurate translation
text: Certain Italian translations need improvement.. can I help?
author: Ovua

title: Footer is becoming too cluttered. How to keep clean?
text:
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/abbe3743-5426-4e4c-af34-482e61a5b03c)


We have a bunch of redundant information in the current footer. I would aim to keep it as clean as possible. What do we really need there? Thoughts?

Details like x icon and " ..(en)" breaks the consistency as well. 

Badges will be added soon as well:

https://github.com/openfoodfacts/openfoodfacts-explorer/pull/357
author: github-throwaway
